name: Stalin vs. Martians 3
blurb: Stalin vs. Martians 3 is a glorious follow-up to one of the most ridiculous games of all times.

rewards.reward: ATOMIC RUNNER CHELNOV\r\n============================= \r\nYour name in the game credits \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians

HUSSAR\r\n=============================\r\nBonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

COSSACK\r\n=============================\r\nProud Backer T-Shirt \u2022 Bonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

COMMISSAR\r\n=============================\r\nDigipak \u201cGame of the Year Edition\u201d of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 Proud Backer T-Shirt \u2022 Bonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

USURPER\r\n=============================\r\nCollector\u2019s Edition (numbered, includes SvM3+SvM+Extended Soundtrack+Booklet) \u2022 Proud Backer T-Shirt \u2022 Bonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

PROPAGANDIST\r\n=============================\r\nStalin posters (10 pc) \u2022 Collector\u2019s Edition (numbered, includes SvM3+SvM+Extended Soundtrack+Booklet) \u2022 Proud Backer T-Shirt \u2022 Bonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

IDEOLOGIST\r\n==============================\r\n7 Stalin t-shirts for every day of the week \u2022 Stalin posters (10 pc) \u2022 Collector\u2019s Edition (numbered, includes SvM3+SvM+Extended Soundtrack+Booklet) \u2022 Proud Backer T-Shirt \u2022 Bonus content, including Stalin riding a chicken and more \u2022 Extended Soundtrack (including extra tracks, tracks from original SvM, wild remixes) download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs. Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits

TYRANT\r\n=============================\r\nWooden \u201cMilitary Box\u201d Edition: Numbered, includes SvM3+SvM+Extended Soundtrack, all with exclusive artwork, bonus content, booklet, ARTBOOK & DEVELOPER NOTES, a MEDAL, exclusive PREMIUM BACKER T-SHIRT and more \u2022 7 Stalin t-shirts for every day of the week \u2022 Extended Soundtrack download \u2022 DRM-free PC download of Stalin vs. Martians 3 \u2022 PC download of the original Stalin vs Martians \u2022 Your name in the game credits
WARMONGER\r\n=============================\r\nDESIGN YOU MARTIAN ENEMY (your description/references will become a basis for the enemy unit) + TYRANT TIER (Military Box Edition + stuff)

MASTER OF PUPPETS\r\n=============================\r\nDESIGN ALTERNATE VEHICLE FOR STALIN (your description/references will become a basis for one of the Stalin's means of transportation: which is basically like designing Stalin's unit) + TYRANT TIER (Military Box Edition + stuff)

LYRICAL POET\r\n=============================\r\nWRITE LYRICS FOR ONE OF THE SONGS ON THE SvM3 SOUNDTRACK (you suggest genre and tempo, we send you the music track, you write the track and that's how we make a song) + TYRANT TIER (Military Box Edition + stuff)

DESTROYER OF WORLDS\r\n=============================\r\nDESIGN BOSS CHARACTER (your description/references will be turned into a mighty enemy unit: presumably a big unit, but that's up to you) + TYRANT TIER (Military Box Edition + stuff)
CINEFILE\r\n=============================\r\nDESIGN IN-GAME VIDEO (collaborate with our team on creating a killer Troma-style video for the game) + TYRANT TIER (Military Box Edition + stuff)

CRIMSON GOD\r\n============================= \r\nHOLIDAY IN CAMBODIA.Yes, we\u2019re serious. Meet the core team of SvM & SvM3 in Cambodia for a 5-day holiday. Discuss anything, drink, travel. Tickets to Cambodia not included. Lodging is included. \u2022 ULTIMATE AMMO CRATE EDITION. Metal ammo crate, SvM3+SvM+Extended Soundtrack+Bonus Content. Exclusive artwork. Booklet and artbook. An ORDER. All of the SvM3 posters. Exclusive ultimate backer t-shirt. A DOG TAG with your name (or any name of your choice). Plus surprise extra items.
